pitch.cc: Charlie Morton has thrown 64 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 93 over the past 10 pitches.
Charlie Morton showed faith in Ryan Doumit by throwing that curveball in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.
Charlie Morton didn't stick to the scouting report; Pedro Feliz is hitting .333 this season against two-seam fastballs in that location.
